name: Komorebi (Klace)
description:
Klace returns with a third story, set on an Earth governed by fate and social discord. The year is 2041, and Komorebi dominates the world. A phenomenon that eludes understanding, causing people to regularly experience a vision of their future. The world is obsessed with “fate”. Obsessed with Komorebi; a word used to describe sunlight as it filters through the branches of trees. It's a simple and poetic metaphor for the visions filtering into this reality. When the phenomenon began, the world was never the same.

If Winds of Change was a story about how one person with visions (The Seer) can change the world, Komorebi is a story about how a world of visions can change one person on an intimate, personal level. A coming-of-age/slice of life story about a group of friends finding their way in a life that they believe may already be predetermined. Please note that while this world and the phenomenon of Komorebi are rather abstract, they allow for a realistic exploration into mental health topics that some may find distressing.

JerryBerry and Nineki99 deliver stunning Environment and Character art.

The game will be FULLY voice acted, by the following incredible cast. The demo is too!


VA: Sean Chiplock (Revali, Breath of The Wild)VA: Jonah Scott (Legoshi, Beastars)VA: Michael Kovach (Angel Dust, Hazbin Hotel)VA: Casey Mongillo (Shinji, Neon Genesis Evangelion)VA: Jesse Inocalla (Soren, The Dragon Prince)

                                     Komorebi also features John Malone and Keri Horn in supporting roles.

Joel Steudler delivers a unique soundtrack. Modern sound, with classical sensibilities.
